MC_SetCoordinateTransform (FB)
MC_SetCoordinateTransform (FB)
Â¶
FUNCTION_BLOCK MC_SetCoordinateTransform
This function block sets a coordinate transformation between the
world coordinate system (WCS) and the product- or machine-coordinate
system (PCS_*/MCS).
Note
When the PCS is dynamic (in the sense that the PCS is moving
relative to WCS), please use
MC_SetDynCoordTransform
instead.
This FB does not start a movement (administrative FB).
InOut:
Scope
Name
Type
Comment
Inout
AxisGroup
AXIS_GROUP_REF_SM3
Reference to a group of axis
Input
Execute
BOOL
Sets the coordinate transformation on rising edge
CoordTransform
MC_COORD_REF
The coordinate transformation, i.e. a product coordinate
system (PCS_1 or PCS_2) or machine coordinate system (MCS)
expressed in the world coordinate system (WCS)
CoordSystem
SMC_COORD_SYSTEM
Which coordinate transformation is to be set.  Allowed values are
PCS_1, PCS_2, and MCS.
Name
STRING
The name of the coordinate system.
Output
Done
BOOL
The transformation has been set successfully
Busy
BOOL
The FB is not finished
Error
BOOL
Signals that an error has occurred within the function block
ErrorID
SMC_ERROR
Error identification

rows.Name: AxisGroup
rows.Comment: Reference to a group of axis

rows.Name: Execute
rows.Comment: Sets the coordinate transformation on rising edge

rows:
The coordinate transformation, i.e. a product coordinate
system (PCS_1 or PCS_2) or machine coordinate system (MCS)
expressed in the world coordinate system (WCS)

Which coordinate transformation is to be set.  Allowed values are
PCS_1, PCS_2, and MCS.
The name of the coordinate system.

rows.Name: Done
rows.Comment: The transformation has been set successfully
